name: dftr4

body.origin:
|- wb(wtr(c0), wss(c0, cpw(c0)))
-| wb(wtr(c0), wss(cuni(c0), c0))
-| wb(wss(c0, cpw(c0)), wss(cuni(c0), c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wtr(c0), wss(c0, cpw(c0)))
-| wb(wtr(c0), wss(cuni(c0), c0))
-| wb(wss(c0, cpw(c0)), wss(cuni(c0), c0))

|- wb(wtr(c0), wss(c0, cpw(c0)))
-| wb(wss(c0, cpw(c0)), wss(cuni(c0), c0))

comment: An alternate way of defining a transitive class. Definition of [Enderton] p. 71. (Contributed by NM, 29-Aug-1993.)
